titles.title: Jesus, and Shall It Ever Be?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, and shall it ever be, A mortal man ashamed of Thee? Ashamed of Thee, Whom angels praise Whose glories shine thro' endless days?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Ashamed of Jesus! that dear Friend On whom my hopes of heav'n depend! No; when I blush, be this my shame, That I no more revere His name.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Ashamed of Jesus! yes, I may, When I've no guilt to wash away; No tears to wipe, no good to crave, No fears to quell, no soul to save.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Till then--nor is my boasting vain-- Till then I boast a Savior slain; And O, may this my glory be, That Christ is not ashamed of me. Amen.
